div.bibl: Zgoda, Vol. XXII, No. 10, March 5, 1903. MEETING

body.p: On Friday, the 6th of March 1903, in the home of the Polish National Alliance, 102-104 W. Division Street, at the hour of 7:30 P. M., there will be a meeting of the committee erecting a home for the aged and crippled.
On this meeting the chairman will state a delivered opinion of Mr. Cumings, the lawyer representing the Polish National Alliance in the affairs of erecting this structure.
